Budget Committee Meeting - 04/27/20
NOTICE OF BUDGET COMMITTEE MEETING
A public meeting for the Budget Committee of the Gervais School District #1, Marion County, State of Oregon, to discuss the budget for the fiscal year of July 1, 2020 to June 30, 2021 will be held virtually since the district facilities are anticipated to be closed as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. The meeting will take place on April 30, 2020 at 6:00 P.M. The purpose of the meeting is to receive the budget message and to hear comments from the public on the budget.
The meeting will be available for viewing via Zoom. All participants will login to:
Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82869906008?pwd=RmF2Mlo2eDgybkVUcGo1Wk0zMVlFZz09
Public comment will be taken in writing and by phone. Written comments received by 5 p.m. on April 28, 2020 will be read during the public comment section of the meeting on April 30, 2020. Comments by phone will be taken on a scheduled basis during the public comment section of the meeting on April 30, 2020. Comments, both written and phone in, will be subject to a three-minute limit per community member. To schedule public comment, please provide your name, phone number, and address with the district by calling 503-792-3803 x 5020 or email to Melissa_wolfer@gervais.k12.or.us
A copy of the budget document may be inspected online after April 28, 2020 at http://www.gervais.k12.or.us/district/departments/>Business/Fiscal. This is a public meeting where deliberation of the Budget Committee will take place. Any person may provide comment at the meetings. Meeting notice information can be found at: www.gervais.k12.or.us > Community > News/Press Release.
